caption.p: ( a) Thermal evolution of luminescence intensity ratio (LIR); ( b) their relative sensitivities for Y 3Al 5âˆ’xGa xO 12 nanocrystals; ( c) the temperature at which the maximal value of S 4 was observed; ( d) S 4max as a function of Ga 3+ concentration; ( e, f) the CIE 1931 chromatic coordinates calculated for Y 3Al 4GaO 12:V and Y 3AlGa 4O 12:V nanocrystals, respectively.
